original: 12.8. Cūḷantaraduka, Hetuduka🔽Naappaccayaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkhataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nasanidassanaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: cūḍantaraduka hetuduka  na appaccayam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na asaṅkhatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca  na sanidassanam na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi  na sappaṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na appaṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā nava ārammaṇe eka adhipatiyā nava pe aññamaññe cha pe avigate nava
translated: The Numerical Series of Terms Beginning with the Duka

original: Narūpiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naarūpiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane🔽ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na rūpim na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na arūpim na hetum dhammam paṭicca 🔽hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane 🔽ekam pe a vigate nava
translated: With respect to a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause dhammā is conditionally related as root-cause. With respect to a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause dhammā is conditionally related as object. With respect to a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause dhammā is conditionally related as pre-nascence. With respect to a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause dhammā is conditionally related as proximity. With respect to a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause dhammā is conditionally related as contiguity. With respect to a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause dhammā is conditionally related as dependence. With respect to a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause dhammā is conditionally related as association. With respect to a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause dhammā is conditionally related as presence. With respect to a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause dhammā is conditionally related as non-disappearance. With respect to a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause dhammā is conditionally related as root-cause, as object, as pre-nascence, as proximity, as contiguity, as dependence, as association, as presence, as non-disappearance. With respect to a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause dhammā is conditionally related as root-cause, as object, as pre-nascence, as proximity, as contiguity, as dependence, as association, as presence, as non-disappearance, as root-cause. With respect to a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause dhammā is conditionally related as root-cause, as object, as pre-nascence, as proximity, as contiguity, as dependence, as association, as presence, as non-disappearance, as root-cause, as object. With respect to a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause dhammā is conditionally related as root-cause, as object, as pre-nascence, as proximity, as contiguity, as dependence, as association, as presence, as non-disappearance, as root-cause

original: Nalokiyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nalokuttaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na lokiyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na lokuttaram na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca
translated: … a non-perceptible … a supra-mundane … (Abbreviated.) … with cause as condition, five … with object as condition, two … with non-hindrance as condition, five.

original: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanakenaci viññeyyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na kenacid viññeyyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na na kenacid viññeyyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: … with the not-inconstant … with the not-not-inconstant …
